snippet: Chris Canty’s unusual face mask is not worn to intimidate, although it does; it’s worn to protect against a potentially career-ending injury.
abstract: New York Giants defensive lineman Chris Canty wears an unusual and intimidating face mask, but its actual purpose is to protect a vulnerable eye from a potentially career-ending injury.
lead_paragraph: Chris Canty’s unusual face mask is not worn to intimidate, although it does; it’s worn to protect against a potentially career-ending injury.

headline.seo: Why the Giants’ Chris Canty Wears the Big Grille
headline.main: The Man in the Mask Is a Key Giant
headline.print_headline: The Man In the Mask Is a Key Giant
